infos.value: You heard what the Leonis soldier said earlier, right?
Oh yeah, you bet I heard it. Every last word, aye!
They really are ancient relics, aye!?
This should make up for the fact that we let Helena get killed!
But wait, Brother. These ancient relics would be wasted on Muraga!
You're saying, we offer them to Lord Sadali?
He might even consider us a bit more valuable if we do, aye?
Y-you two are out of your minds!
The ancient relics will be handed over to King Muraga.
Step away from the stone chest!
Oh no, we aren't going anywhere.
Got a problem with that, aye? Then bring it on!
